info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 5:10AM EST until December 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Falls Village. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. At 9.0 feet, Water floods Riverside Road at Kent School and begins to approach buildings. Water gets close to Route 7. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 6.3 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Wed 4 am: 8.8 Forecast: Wed 7 am 8.8 Wed 1 pm 8.8 Wed 7 pm 8.7 Thu 1 am 8.6 Thu 7 am 8.3 Thu 1 pm 8.0 Thu 7 pm 7.7 Fri 1 am 7.4 Fri 7 am 7.0 Fri 1 pm 6.8 Fri 7 pm 6.5 Sat 1 am 6.3 &&
